meta.title: dataStore
meta.description: Gets the DataStore service for the app. [Learn more about DataStore](/guides/datastore/).

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options to configure the dataStore's data type(`json` or `text`). If the dataStore will receive data from JS SDK, use `json` in any situations. You will use `text` when the dataStore receive data from like embed devices. Value must not be null.
